greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n in which the maximal multiplicity of parts equals 3.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, p!, `if`(i<1, 0,
add(b(n-i*j, i-1, p+j, k)/j!, j=0..min(n/i, k))))
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 29 2014
